00022 /**
00023  * @file   apt-dmet-copynumber.cpp

00028 //
00029 #include "dmet/DmetCopyNumberEngine.h"
00030 //
00031 #include "chipstream/EngineUtil.h"
00032 #include "util/AptVersionInfo.h"
00033 #include "util/BaseEngine.h"
00034 #include "util/Err.h"
00035 #include "util/Fs.h"
00036 #include "util/LogStream.h"
00037 #include "util/PgOptions.h"
00038 #include "util/Util.h"
00039 
00040 //
00041 #ifndef WIN32
00042 #include <unistd.h>
00043 #endif /* WIN32 */
00044 
00045 
00046 /** Everybody's favorite function... */
00047 int main(int argc,const char* argv[]) {
00048   ofstream logOut;
00049   LogStream log;
00050   string logName;
00051     
00052   try {
00053 
00054     DmetCopyNumberEngine engine;
00055   
00056     const string version = AptVersionInfo::version();
00057     const string cvsId = AptVersionInfo::cvsId();
00058     const string versionToReport = AptVersionInfo::versionToReport();
00059     const string execGuid = affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid();
00060     
00061     /* Parse options. */
00062     engine.setUsage(
00063                  "apt-dmet-copynumber - compute copynumber state for DMET3.\n"
00064                  "\n"
00065                  "usage:\n"
00066                  "    apt-dmet-copynumber ... \n"
00067                  );
00068 
00069 
00070     engine.parseArgv(argv);
00071     Verbose::setLevel(engine.getOptInt("verbose"));
00072     FsPath prog_path(engine.getProgName());
00073     const string progName = prog_path.getBaseName();
00074     engine.setOpt("command-line",engine.commandLine());
00075     engine.setOpt("program-name",progName);
00076     engine.setOpt("program-company","Affymetrix");
00077     engine.setOpt("program-version",version);
00078     engine.setOpt("program-cvs-id",cvsId);
00079     engine.setOpt("version-to-report",versionToReport);
00080     engine.setOpt("exec-guid",execGuid);
00081     if(argc == 1) { engine.setOpt("help","true"); }
00082     
00083     // Check Options. Will print out version/help if requested then exit.
00084     engine.checkOptions();
00085     
00086     /* Set up the logging and message handlers. */
00087     if(!Fs::isWriteableDir(engine.getOpt("out-dir"))) {
00088         if(Fs::mkdirPath(engine.getOpt("out-dir"), false) != APT_OK) {
00089             Err::errAbort("Can't make or write to directory: " + engine.getOpt("out-dir"));
00090         }
00091     }
00092     if (engine.getOpt("log-file") != "") {
00093       logName = engine.getOpt("log-file");
00094     }
00095     else {
00096       logName = Fs::join(engine.getOpt("out-dir"), "apt-dmet-copynumber.log");
00097     }
00098     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(logOut, logName.c_str());
00099     log.setStream(&logOut);
00100     Verbose::pushMsgHandler(&log);
00101     Verbose::pushProgressHandler(&log);
00102     Verbose::pushWarnHandler(&log);
00103     
00104     engine.run();
00105   } 
00106   catch(...) {
00107       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00108       // Close log files
00109       logOut.close();
00110       return 1;
00111   }
00112 
00113   // Close log files
00114   logOut.close();
00115 
00116   return 0;
00117 }
